title: This service can license user content to third parties

tosdr.case: This service can license user content to third parties
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "You hereby grant Blizzard a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, fully paid up, non-exclusive, sub-licensable, right and license to exploit the User Content and all elements thereof, in any and all media, formats and forms, known now or hereafter devised."
